name: Randy
description:
This game is made for $104 Adventure Game Challenge Jam.

Use WASD to move, press Escape to see the intels collected, press I to see keys collected, press F to interact with items, click left mouse button to shoot, right mouse button to aim

Please download the setup wizard exe file to install the game. I apologize if you feel uncomfortable with exe file, but itch io has strictly limited the size of the file uploaded and exe file is the most efficient way to compress it

Wake up in a deserted mental hospital on a lonely island, you need to investigate the secrets before you lose your mind...or your life
